application

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Application

  • public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of the application. Contains fields and methods relevant for the whole application and starts it.
    Author:
    Borko Arsović, Milan Radeta, Isidora Škulec

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method of the application. Sets the look and feel of the GUI and prompts the user to login and opens the StartDialog.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • getNewBundle

        public static java.util.ResourceBundle getNewBundle()
        Gets ResourceBundle according to value of locale. Method is customized for Serbian (Latin) and Serbian (Cyrilic).
        Returns:
        ResourceBundle
        See Also:
        Locale, ResourceBundle, ResourceBundle.Control, ResourceBundle.Control.getCandidateLocales(String, Locale)

      • updateLanguage

        public static void updateLanguage(java.util.Locale locale)
        Changes the language of all GUI elements given the new Locale.
        Parameters:
        locale -

      • showErrorMessage

        public static void showErrorMessage(java.lang.String messageKey)
        Given the String with the key of the error message, it creates a popup dialog informing the user of an occurred error. Parameter messageKey is used to reference a localised error message.
        Parameters:
        messageKey -
        See Also:
        showErrorMessage(String, Object[]), showSqlExceptionError(SQLException)

      • showErrorMessage

        public static void showErrorMessage(java.lang.String messageKey,
                    java.lang.Object[] args)
        Given the String with the key of the error message, it creates a popup dialog informing the user of an occurred error. Parameter messageKey is used to reference a localised error message. Parameter args (an array of Objects) is used if there are objects affected by the error.
        Parameters:
        messageKey -
        args -
        See Also:
        showErrorMessage(String), showSqlExceptionError(SQLException)

      • showSqlExceptionError

        public static void showSqlExceptionError(java.sql.SQLException e)
        A special error message method specifically for SQL errors. Parameter e is a SQLException object.
        Parameters:
        e -
        See Also:
        showErrorMessage(String), showErrorMessage(String, Object[])
